description: Web component definition for 'paper-tabs', a Polymer-based custom element implementing a tabbed interface with styling, behavior, and interaction logic.

classes.name: paper-tabs
classes.description: Custom element implementing a tabbed interface with styling and behavior.

methods.name: _noinkChanged
methods.description: Updates 'noink' attribute on child 'paper-tab' elements based on property change.

methods.name: _setNoinkAttribute
methods.description: Sets 'noink' attribute on a given element.

methods.name: _removeNoinkAttribute
methods.description: Removes 'noink' attribute from a given element.

methods.name: _computeScrollButtonClass
methods.description: Determines CSS class for scroll buttons based on visibility conditions.

methods.name: _computeTabsContentClass
methods.description: Returns CSS class for tabs content container based on 'scrollable' property.

methods.name: _computeSelectionBarClass
methods.description: Returns CSS class for selection bar based on 'noBar' and 'alignBottom' properties.

methods.name: _onResize
methods.description: Handles resize events to adjust tab layout.

methods.name: _onIronSelect
methods.description: Handles 'iron-select' event to update tab selection visuals.

methods.name: _onIronDeselect
methods.description: Handles 'iron-deselect' event to update tab visuals.

methods.name: _scroll
methods.description: Handles scroll events for tab scrolling.

methods.name: _down
methods.description: Handles pointer down events for focus management.

methods.name: _affectScroll
methods.description: Adjusts scroll position of tab container.

methods.name: _onLeftScrollButtonDown
methods.description: Starts scrolling left when left button is pressed.

methods.name: _onRightScrollButtonDown
methods.description: Starts scrolling right when right button is pressed.

methods.name: _onScrollButtonUp
methods.description: Stops scrolling when scroll button is released.

methods.name: _scrollToLeft
methods.description: Scrolls the tab container to the left.

methods.name: _scrollToRight
methods.description: Scrolls the tab container to the right.

methods.name: _tabChanged
methods.description: Updates selection indicator position when tab selection changes.

methods.name: _scrollToSelectedIfNeeded
methods.description: Scrolls to make the selected tab visible if needed.

methods.name: _calcPercent
methods.description: Calculates percentage width based on element sizes.

methods.name: _positionBar
methods.description: Positions and scales the selection bar.

methods.name: _onBarTransitionEnd
methods.description: Handles transition end events for the selection bar animation.
